definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Nu 30:8 bond, binding obligation (cf. BAram. [[אֱסָר]], Syr. 0esor; so forms with suff. infr. v. Ba:NB 62 cf. Sta:§ 208 a; but perh. Aram. loan-word v. Lag:BN 175)—´[[א]] abs. Nu 30:3 +; cstr. v:Nu 30:13; sf. [[אֶסְרָהּ]] v:Nu 30:5; pl. sf. [[אֱסָרֶיהָ]] v:Nu 30:6; v:Nu 30:15, [[אֱסָרֶהָ]] v:Nu 30:8—only Nu 30 (P), binding obligation of oath or vow; mostly acc. cogn. with [[אָסַר]] (q.v.); Nu 30:3, Nu 30:4, Nu 30:5, Nu 30:5, Nu 30:6, Nu 30:8, Nu 30:11, Nu 30:12; [[אִסָּר נַפְשָׁהּ]] v:Nu 30:13; [[שְׁבֻעַת אִסָּר]] binding oath v:Nu 30:14.
